event.title: SWmobile: Feb talk night
event.description:
The evening's talks, loosely around testing.  

Chris Williams - Test Automation in Practice with Xamarin TestCloud at MixRadio 

Adam Butler - Bullet-proof Push

Josh Baldwin - Open Device Lab(ODL) Bristol -  Who? What? Why? Where?

The usual format: 

• 18:00-18:15 - organisers/volunteers arrive

• 18:30 doors open / pizza arrive

• 19:00 Intro by SWmobile organiser (venue admin i.e toilets, fire exits)

• 19:05 talk one

• 19:[masked]min comfort break

• 19:50 Talk two

• 20:10 Talk three 

• 20:30 finish up and head to the pub 

• 20:45 Volunteers leave after helping tidy up
